competitors.name: Anta
competitors.market_position: Leading Chinese sportswear brand benefiting from the 'Guochao' trend; significant competitor in China with expanding global presence.

competitors.name: Li-Ning
competitors.market_position: Prominent Chinese sportswear brand capitalizing on nationalistic consumer preferences; key competitor to Nike in China and expanding internationally.

competitors.name: adidas
competitors.market_position: International sportswear brand competing with Nike in China and globally, with a strong presence in lifestyle and athletic wear.

competitors.name: Salomon
competitors.market_position: Chinese-owned brand mentioned as a growing competitor in sportswear, though less prominent than Anta and Li-Ning.
